form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar (for herself and Mr. Budd) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to equalize the charitable mileage rate with the business travel rate.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Volunteer Driver Tax Appreciation Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Subsection (i) of section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking shall be 14 cents per mile. and inserting

paragraph.text: except as provided in paragraph (2), 14 cents per mile, and

in the case of transportation of persons (other than the taxpayer) or property on behalf of an organization described in subsection (c), a rate determined by the Secretary which shall not be less than the standard mileage rate used for purposes of sections 162 and 212.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
